name: Fire Emblem: Three Houses - Lysithea von Ordelia Pop Up Parade
description:
"I just worked harder."



POP UP PARADE is a series of figures that are easy to collect with affordable prices and speedy releases! Each figure typically stands around 17-18cm in height and the series features a vast selection of characters from popular anime and game series, with many more to be added soon!



From "Fire Emblem: Three Houses" comes a third set of figures, this time featuring two characters from the Golden Deer! Lysithea of the Golden Deer has been captured in figure form. Enjoy her calm and composed expression captured in figure form! Be sure to display him with Claude (sold separately), also available for preorder from the same time!

From "Fire Emblem: Three Houses" comes a third set of figures, this time featuring two characters from the Golden Deer! Lysithea of the Golden Deer has been captured in figure form. Enjoy her calm and composed expression captured in figure form! Be sure to display him with Claude (sold separately), also available for preorder from the same time!
  • Size approx: 6.7 inches tall
  • Material: PVC, ABS
  • Manufacturer: Good Smile Company
  • U.S. Release Date: August 2023

name: Naruto Shippuden - Uchiha Madara S.H.Figuarts (SDCC Exclusive Color Edition)
description:
Madara Uchiha from “Naruto: Shippuden” is now available in an exclusive event edition!


[Set Contents] Main body, Exchangeable hand left/right x 3 types, Exchangeable arm parts left/right, exchangeable expression parts x 2 types, weapon parts.

  • Size approx: 6.1 inches tall
  • Material: PVC, ABS
  • Manufacturer: Bandai
  • U.S. Release Date: September 2022

name: Kakegurui - Yumeko Jabami (Bunny Ver)
description:
The gambling beauty Yumeko Jabami is now a sexy bunny figure!


From "KAKEGURUI xx" comes a scale figure of Yumeko Jabami! Yumeko has been recreated in FREEing's trademark big size is dressed in a casino dealer-themed bunny suit—a perfect fit for the compulsive gambler. Her impressive curves and daring smile have all been faithfully captured in figure form, so be sure to add her to your collection!

  • Size approx: 17” inches tall
  • Material: PVC, ABS
  • Manufacturer: FREEing

name: Overlord - Albedo Coreful Figure Prize Figure (Nightwear Ver.)
description:
Introducing a new Coreful Figure of Albedo from Overlord IV!


Albedo is ready for bed in her light and frilly nightwear. Albedo is sure to be a perfect addition to any Overlord fans collection!

  • Size approx: 7.09 inches tall

name: Overlord - Albedo Aqua Float Girls Prize Figure
description:
Introducing a new Aqua Float Girls Figure of Albedo from Overlord IV!


Albedo in a cute bikini, is floating along on her inner tube with a declaration of love for the titular Overloard, Ainz, on it. This is sure to be a perfect addition to any Overlord fan’s collection!

  • Size approx: 3.94 inches tall
  • Material: PVC
  • Manufacturer: Taito
  • U.S. Release Date: July 2022

name: Overlord IV - Albedo (T-Shirt Swimsuit Ver.) Coreful Figure
description:
We’re happy to present a new TAITO Coreful Figure of Albedo from Overlord IV.


The guardian overseer is taking off her top getting ready to swim and revealing a gorgeous swimsuit underneath. This is the perfect addition to any Overlord IV fan’s collection!

  • Size approx: 7.09 inches
  • Material: PVC
  • Manufacturer: Taito
  • U.S. Release Date: June 2023

name: Genshin Impact - Lumine 1/7 Scale Figure (With Bonus Face)
description:
Step into a vast magical world of adventure!


Lumine, the heroine of the open-world RPG Genshin Impact is coming out as a figure! Fine details of her clothing and decorations have been elaborately and attractively recreated.


Display her together with Aether and Barbara to further recreate the world of Genshin Impact!

name: Chainsaw Man - Chainsaw Man 1/7 Scale Figure
description:
From the anime and manga series Chainsaw Man comes a 1/7 scale figure of Chainsaw Man! Please enjoy the dynamic figure that cuts through zombies and demons.

  • Size approx: 11 inches tall
  • Material: PVC
  • Manufacturer: eStream
  • U.S. Release Date: October 2023
